cause.description:
To train youth in the principles of good citizenship music and physical fitness. To sponsor the Santa Clara Vanguard Drum & Bugle corps and to develop attitudes of sportsmanship, fair play, and clean living. All funds are dispersed in furtherance of those objectives and no money is distributed to any individual or organization except for those purposes. Scholarships awarded to corps members are based on members' grades as well as their conformity to the objectives listed above.
http://www.scvanguard.org/
Programs: Santa Clara Vanguard Drum & Bugle Corps Vanguard Cadets Drum & Bugle Corps Vanguard Winter Guard Childrens Adventures in Movement
1. To train youth in the principles of good citizenship music and physical fitness.
2. Developing attitudes of sportsmanship, fair play, and clean living
cause.mission: To provide the opportunity to devlop an appreciation for the performing arts through participation, thus instilling characteristics of integrity, dedication, excellence and good citizenship.
